alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 10:13AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tippah, Tishomingo, northern Prentiss, Alcorn, southeastern Hardeman, southern McNairy and southern Hardin Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1013 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Theo, or 8 miles southwest of Big Hill Pond State Park, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Ripley, Iuka, Pickwick Landing State Park, J P Coleman State Park, Big Hill Pond State Park, Burnsville, Jumpertown, Glen, Pickwick Dam, Thrashers, Theo, Midway, Walnut Grove, Pocahontas, Pineflat, Hinkle, Leedy and Gravestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
